alert.note: Alert for Kittitas Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 19 at 2:37AM PDT until May 19 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Kittitas Valley. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 10 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust will be possible, especially near any bare or recently plowed fields. Travelers should use caution and prepare for possible visibility reductions. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
